title: Just need Chesbro and Joss to finish my HOF set

posts.post_title: Just need Chesbro and Joss to finish my HOF set
posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy a t206 Chesbro and Joss in the SGC 50-80 range or psa/raw equal to finish my one pose of each HOF in the t206 set. If anybody has one or 
both for sale let me know. 
[URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]

Here is a link to what I have so far.
[url]http://s732.photobucket.com/albums/ww326/mhgt76528/t206%20HOF%20collection/?albumview=grid[/url]

Thanks
Mike
